description: This file is the entry point for a React-based front-end application. It imports React and ReactDOM, as well as CSS and the main App component. It initializes the React application by rendering the App component inside the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
